content: **knitted blanket for baby in drops merino extra fine the piece is worked back and forth with textured pattern and garter stitch ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no me-073-by yarn group b ----------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** small blanket approx 42 x 52 cm large blanket approx 66 x 80 cm **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 200-300 g colour 42 cedar **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 26 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 40 cm and 60 cm or 80 cm needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
